name: Donordonut
overview:
Donordonut is the company to create solution for ‘increase social value’ consistently.

< Donation is easy and fun! > Donordonut helps people to do good work with just one small touch. Through our application, people can share their goods, money, even though warm words. Everything in our application called ‘donut’. And every donut has their own stories and special memories. All of our users are ‘donor’ in Donordonut. People can upload their ‘donut’ at any time any place. And people can buy ‘donut’ with moderate prices. Usually profits go to seller. But earnings from ‘donut’ go to charities or supporter’s organization which selected by donor. So both seller and customer can be a donor. Donordonut makes people easy to access news from charities and associations. It will help to people to join various project of valuable experience. No money? With warm words, people can be a donor in here. You can send words of comfort, words of encouragement to person who ask someone’s advice. We are going to support warm mail service which looks like hand writing letter. You can receive letter from all over the world and send letter too. We hope it will make user be happy. Every donor can be a friend in Donordonut. People who share their goods and experiences can be closer. It is easy to make a friend .Just need small touch. Money is not the only one for donation. It is not difficult thing. It is easy and fun. We are going to extends new trend of donation with new words “Let’s donut”. We have plans to make a common platform of social activities for various parties like charity, association, organization, company, and individuals. The advertising revenue and commission will be our benefit model. We hope not only existing online donors but also potential donor can be a real donor through Donordonut.
